A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and grants the wielder additional reach.
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and grants the wielder additional reach.
tetra.variant.sword_socket/rose_quartz.d: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and grants the wielder additional reach.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/nullifier.name: Nullifier
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/nullifier.descr: Attach a gravity nullification unit, which lowers the gravity experienced by the belt's wearer. As a side-effect of this, fall damage is also completely nullified.
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/radiant.name: Radiant
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/radiant.descr: The latent energy of Refined Radiance allows this tool to harvest many blocks at a time depending upon the tool's function.
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/voiding.name: Voiding
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/voiding.descr: The void powers infused into Shadow Steel give this tool incredible power at the cost of converting ALL drops to experience. Fortune and Looting both increase dropped experience.
tetra.improvement.tetrapak/moonstrike.de: The moonstone used to make this tool gains strength based on moon phase.
tetrapak.stats.voiding.tooltip: This tool will void the drops of blocks mined and mobs killed with it in exchange for experience. Scales with fortune and looting.
tetrapak.stats.deforesting.tooltip: This tool will chop down any tree in a single swing.
tetrapak.stats.nullifying.tooltip: Wearing this belt will reduce gravity experienced the wearer by §e%s§r
tetrapak.stats.moonstrike.tooltip: This tool will deal §e%s%%§r bonus damage and break blocks §e%s%%§r faster on a full moon. Lesser bonuses apply for intermediate moon phases.
